thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 9 of 1908
thread.title: Anne

author: Anne
title: Anne
text: One crew member spilled liquid on guy sitting next to me. She served everyone around us but forgot us surprisingly. Took at least 20 minutes to get someone's attention. The guy next to me was totally annoyed. Other than that flight from Boston to Atlanta went well. Flight from Atlanta to Savannah seemed to me to be on quite older plane. I was wondering if the plane was going to lose an engine.
